description: Here it is once again. It's that time of the year. Valve have opened the floodgates for you to throw money at your screen during the Steam Summer Sale 2024.
title: Steam Summer Sale 2024 is live now

description: While every month Valve has been posting a fresh set of the most played Steam Deck games for the previous month, they've now added a dedicated Steam Chart for it.
title: Valve has a new Steam Chart for the most played Steam Deck games

description: The time is finally here. The next big stable update to the NVIDIA proprietary driver for Linux with version 555.58 bringing Wayland Explicit Sync.
title: NVIDIA driver 555.58 released as stable bringing Wayland Explicit Sync

description: Distance is a name I've not heard for a while. A really good fun sci-fi racing platformer from developer Refract that released in 2018, and they're bringing it back for v1.5: The Kinetic Update.
title: Sc-fi racing platformer Distance gets a surprise update with Steam Deck improvements

description: Distance is a name I've not heard for a while. A really good fun sci-fi racing platformer from developer Refract that released in 2018, and they're bringing it back for v1.5: The Kinetic Update.
title: Sci-fi racing platformer Distance gets a surprise update with Steam Deck improvements

description: Decky Loader is a very popular tool to add plugins to the Steam Deck Gaming Mode, and Decky Loader 3.0 should be a big improvement.
title: Steam Deck plugin system Decky Loader 3.0 gets a first pre-release

description: Star Trek: Resurgence released on Steam back in May and Dramatic Labs have continued to put up improvements, with the latest being a good update for Steam Deck players.
title: Star Trek: Resurgence update should give a smoother experience on Steam Deck

description: For fans of racing games, you may want to act quickly and pick up Forza Horizon 4 before it gets delisted in December.
title: Forza Horizon 4 is getting delisted in December

description: Looks like Humble Bundle may be branching out a bit more, with the Strate-GOG Game Bundle where you redeem them via GOG instead of Steam.
title: GOG and Humble Bundle team up for a strategy game bundle

description: Valve have released SteamOS 3.6.8 Beta showing that they're readying up SteamOS 3.6 for release with it moving from just being in Preview. Plus, a few more updates to the brand new Steam Game Recording for all Steam users.
title: SteamOS 3.6.8 Beta for Steam Deck released, plus more Steam Game Recording updates
